page.title: 12Leisure in Willenhall
page.content: There are 3 community schools in our area,Pool Hayes,Furzebank and Sneyd. I do canoeing and life saving at Pool Hayes.Canoeing is on Thursdays from 7.00 to 8.00 but the more experienced can stop until 9.00.Life saving is on Tuesdays from 6.00 to 7.00.I can now swim 1000 metres and have passed my bronze survival award and am now trying for my silver.My mum goes to keep fit in the gym on Wednesdays and my sister does Karate on Fridays. Other activities which are available include badminton,squash, five a side football,judo,indoor bowling,aerobics and modern dance.My dad is the only one in the family who does not use Pool Hayes,he spends his spare time gardening and fishing.
